Chinese navy's presence in South China Sea is 'worrisome', says Philippine presidentPhilippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. on Wednesday said the Chinese navy's presence in the South China Sea is "worrisome" but will not deter his country from defending its maritime territory and protecting its fishermen. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 00:48:04 GMT 76BQ5CUAMRPXPAABAACNRWFF4Q https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinese-navys-presence-south-china-sea-is-worrisome-says-philippine-president-2024-02-28/Reuters世界亚太地区
China's Country Garden faces liquidation petitionChina's largest private property developer Country Garden Holdings said on Wednesday it was facing a liquidation petition for not repaying a term loan facility worth HK$1.6 billion ($204.5 million). Wed, 28 Feb 2024 00:47:37 GMT KLNJQCRTHJKAHJCANHDU7JJFLQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-country-garden-faces-winding-up-petition-failure-pay-2045-mln-loan-2024-02-28/Reuters世界中国
China urges UN to define roadmap to exempt non-nuclear states from nuclear threat, state media saysThe United Nation's Conference on Disarmament should define a roadmap or timetable for an international legal instrument to exempt non-nuclear-weapon states from the threat of nuclear weapons, the Chinese foreign ministry's department of arms control said, according to state media. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 00:14:30 GMT LXZH3JSALVL37MCL32GQLSMR6I https://www.reuters.com/world/china-urges-un-define-roadmap-exempt-non-nuclear-states-nuclear-threat-state-2024-02-28/Reuters世界
Siblings help China's BYD grab early lead in Thai EV marketAfter launching BYD in Thailand as the Chinese electric vehicle maker's sole national distributor a little more than a year ago, siblings Pratarnwong and Pratarnporn Phornprapha were forced to rip up business plans frequently because sales kept rocketing. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 23:05:24 GMT EBVDNZPITZKILPLARGBHZREG4I https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/siblings-help-chinas-byd-grab-early-lead-thai-ev-market-2024-02-27/Devjyot Ghoshal, Chayut Setboonsarng商业汽车与交通
Applied Materials receives subpoena from SEC on China shipmentsSemiconductor equipment supplier Applied Materials received a subpoena from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) in February, requesting information relating to certain China customer shipments, the company said in a filing on Tuesday. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 22:21:18 GMT KSMJETRQM5P7BJIBCHSYQFFEQU https://www.reuters.com/technology/applied-materials-receives-subpoena-sec-china-shipments-2024-02-27/Reuters技术
Morning Bid: Global monetary focus turns to New ZealandA look at the day ahead in Asian markets. Tue, 27 Feb 2024 21:51:35 GMT FYNDKDBVKBODVJDJPJPLJOFNQQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/global-markets-view-asia-graphic-pix-2024-02-27/Jamie McGeever市场亚洲市场
